channel.title: Notepad++
channel.description: Does anyone know if Notepad++ works for ububtu 10.04? Because I upgraded my OS to that.

item.title: Notepad++
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I LOVE Kate, install that with your package manager and use it.

Read full topic

item.title: Notepad++
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Well isn’t Gedit good for coding? I know that its the basic editor for Lucid Lynx, but I’ve used it while configuring my sister’s wireless driver and it seemed to function similarly to Notepad++.

Read full topic

item.title: Notepad++
item.dc:creator: @lord_fear lord_fear
item.description:
@lord_fear wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:3, topic:358347”]I would opt for a native editor and not a windows application in wine. Scite and geany are virtually the same since they are built on the same text editor lib.

apt-get install scite[/quote]

Which would you advise to be better?

Read full topic

item.title: Notepad++
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:3, topic:358347”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=454852.msg3330583#msg3330583 date=1283444664]
Well I’m pretty sure if its a .sh file you should be able to run it.
[/quote]
lol

@op
I would opt for a native editor and not a windows application in wine. Scite and geany are virtually the same since they are built on the same text editor lib.

apt-get install scite[/quote]I’m not good with Linux >.< I know very little about it tbh.

Read full topic

item.title: Notepad++
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

rip4d:

Well I’m pretty sure if its a .sh file you should be able to run it.

lol

@op
I would opt for a native editor and not a windows application in wine. Scite and geany are virtually the same since they are built on the same text editor lib.

apt-get install scite

Read full topic

Well I’m pretty sure if its a .sh file you should be able to run it. If not, use Wine and you should be able to.
